Sentencas: Nickel oxide-based materials have attracted significant interest for a variety of energy conversion applications although many of their structures remain unresolved.
Titulo: Electronic structure of β-NiOOH with hydrogen vacancies and implications for energy conversion applications

Sentencas: In this study, Density Functional Theory+U (DFT+U) and hybrid DFT calculations are used to analyze the properties of crystalline nickel oxyhydroxide (beta-NiOOH) with hydrogen (H) vacancies.
Titulo: Electronic structure of β-NiOOH with hydrogen vacancies and implications for energy conversion applications

Sentencas: Hydrogen vacancies are found to lower the band gap without creating states inside the band gap.
Titulo: Electronic structure of β-NiOOH with hydrogen vacancies and implications for energy conversion applications

Sentencas: Inter-layer crossing is a possible transport pathway, while intra-layer transport is inhibited.
Titulo: Electronic structure of β-NiOOH with hydrogen vacancies and implications for energy conversion applications

Sentencas: Bulk modulus is not influenced by H vacancies in the crystal.
Titulo: Electronic structure of β-NiOOH with hydrogen vacancies and implications for energy conversion applications

Sentencas: beta-NiOOH with H vacancies exhibits good electronic properties, essential for solid electrolytes and anodes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Electronic structure of β-NiOOH with hydrogen vacancies and implications for energy conversion applications
